name: Ibuprofen
uses: Relieves pain, reduces fever, and alleviates inflammation

name: Paracetamol
uses: Reduces fever and relieves mild to moderate pain
side_effects: Nausea, liver damage with excessive use

name: Amoxicillin
uses: Treats bacterial infections like pneumonia and bronchitis
side_effects: Diarrhea, nausea, allergic reactions, skin rash

name: Metformin
uses: Manages blood sugar levels in type 2 diabetes
side_effects: Diarrhea, nausea, stomach pain, lactic acidosis (rare)

name: Lisinopril
uses: Treats high blood pressure and heart failure
